description: Information about the Resource API Transports in a Puppet code environment
title: Environment Transports

___name.description: The name of the environment queried

___transports.description: A list of available transports for this environment

___name.description: The machine readable name of the transport

___desc.description: The human readable description of the transport this schema specifies

___type.description: The PCore type of the connection info property

___desc.description: The description of the connection info property

___sensitive.description: Whether or not the connection info property should be considered sensitive
